IX.iii.2.A.9.a
.
Entitlement Under More Than One Law
For information on the procedures to follow for entitlement under more than one law after an election is received, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, 1.A.4
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Pension Reductions for Medicaid-Covered Nursing Facility Care
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
